Code and Data

Code

  • EDA_fluorescent_labeling.py | Exploratory data analysis first visualizing the labeled vs unlabled microtubule subunits in catastrope.

  • poisson_modeling_microtubule.py | Models microtubule catastrope as a poisson process.

  • confint_microtubule.py | Graphs confience intervals for the EDA of fluorescent labeling.

  • MLE_of_microtubules.py | MLE of microtubule catastrophe data modeled with both gamma and poisson distributions.

  • model_comparison_microtubule.py | Comparing gamma and poisson distributions from MLE_of_microtubules.

  • dashboard.py | Interactive dashboard of our proposed model for microtubule time to catastrophe.

Data Sets

  • Microtubule time to catastrophe | (filetype: .csv)(5 kb)

  • Microtubule time to catastrophe only tubulin | (filetype: .csv)(11 kb)
